story:
Once upon a time, in the vast desert of Sudan, there lived a young and adventurous camel named Jamal. Jamal was known in the desert for his kind heart and his love for exploring new places.

One hot evening, as the sun dipped below the horizon, Jamal decided to go on a nighttime adventure. He waited until all the other camels were fast asleep before setting off into the dark desert, guided only by the shimmering light of the stars above.

As Jamal walked through the sandy dunes, he heard a faint cry coming from a distance. Curious and concerned, he followed the sound until he discovered a baby desert fox trapped in a deep hole. The little fox had fallen in and couldn't get out on his own.

Without hesitation, Jamal lowered his long and sturdy neck down into the hole, allowing the baby fox to climb up and out to safety. The grateful fox thanked Jamal and told him about a hidden oasis beyond the next set of dunes, where rare and magical flowers bloom only at night.

Excited by the prospect of seeing these special flowers, Jamal and the baby fox set off together towards the oasis. Along the way, they encountered a wise old tortoise who joined them on their journey, adding to the camaraderie of their group.

Finally, they reached the hidden oasis, and to their amazement, they found the night-blooming flowers in full bloom, casting a beautiful, ethereal glow over the tranquil water. The sight was truly magical, and the trio sat together, enjoying the peaceful moment under the shimmering starlit sky.

After a while, as the night grew late, Jamal realized it was time to return home before the sun rose again. With a fond farewell to his new friends, Jamal made his way back through the desert, feeling grateful for the wonderful adventure and the special bond they had shared.

And so, under the watchful eyes of the twinkling stars above, Jamal returned to his family and settled down for the night, carrying with him the memories of his remarkable adventure and the tale of the magical night-blooming flowers at the hidden oasis.

And as the night drew to a close, the desert fell silent once again, with Jamal drifting off to sleep, dreaming of future adventures and the heartfelt connections he had made along the way.

The end. Goodnight, little one. Sleep tight and dream of daring desert escapades.
